document_data.mainbody:
'''''Big Problems''''', designed by [[Marcello De Velazquez]], is an adventure in the [[Adventurers League/Dreams of the Red Wizards|Dreams of the Red Wizards]] storyline published for the [[Adventurers League]]. It is the first part of the ''Red Seeds'' series that takes place in the wake of ''[[Storm King's Thunder]].''

{{Quote|The town of [[Daggerford]] is in over its head, and needs heroes to solve a really big problem. Things will get worse before they get better.{{Cite adventurers league/Big Problems|2}}|}}
document_data.Synopsis: As the [[Red Wizards of Thay]] were working to dominate the [[Sword Coast]] under [[Szass Tam]]'s command, Queen [[Serissa]] of [[Maelstrom (fortress)|Maelstrom]] sendt an envoy, a young vegetarian [[storm giant]] [[Trosius]] to broker an alliance with the city of Daggerford against the Rid Wizards. Knowing how a group of little ones had restored the [[Ordning (social structure)|Ordning]], she wanted to ally with the settlements of the Sword Coast. [[Illan Darosi]], a [[Thay]]an spy tried to sick adventurers on the storm giant envoy, trying to convince the group and the locals that the giant was behind killing of [[cattle]] in the [[Daggerford/Farmlands|Daggerford Farmlands]]. The heroes discovered the Thayan ploy and apprehended the spy, his Red Wizard apprentice and hired bandits. Subsequently, the alliance was forged and [[Alekka Golt]], a retired city militiawoman, was assigned as an envoy to Maelstrom.
